long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beanstalk is the first ever decentralized, non-collateralized, algorithmic stablecoin. This Chrome extension will allow you to keep track of the price of one bean by making API calls for you every 10 seconds and displaying the price in the chrome extension. Just set the extension to display and watch as the price constantly updates so that you don't have to go to the bean website at https://bean.money/ to go see the current price.
